title: Admission related
content:
If somebody could help me in this situation
So I got admission in pes ece campus cse through management quota(12 lpa) . Now I got a comedk rank of 37XX I have to take cse only bcz of parents so which college would be best for me. I searched about nie mysore is it good?

comments.body: U could try in bmsit or nmit or bit ig
Bro but if u r fine with paying that fees then stick with pes because pes placement is pooled and pes is known for CS placement.
U could get cse with specialisation ig but cse it think closed at 2k last year
Don't Take Admission under Management Quota, It's not worth it.
Nigga just take some college from comedk don't choose pes mgmt quota
Get admission through ComedK (in other universities).
Should I try dsce or nie mysore
I do not know much about ComedK ranks and cutoffs but all I can say is that you should not opt for PES via MQ.
Pes doesn't take admission thro comedk na..... I wad told that there
Directly went to the pes officeðŸ™ƒ
12lpa is not worth it for Pes
